schema.description: Request body for POST /a2a/tasks - create a new task.

callback_url.description: Optional webhook URL for completion notification.

source_agent_id.description:
Optional source agent ID. When an admin user creates a task on behalf
of an agent, they can specify which agent is the source. If omitted,
the JWT subject is used as the source NHI identity.

target_agent_id.description: Target agent ID that will execute the task.

schema.title: CreateA2aTaskRequest
